title: The Premonition
description: A Pennsylvania man is convinced he has a target on his back during his messy divorce. Soon after, he is found stabbed to death and his friends and family realize he was right all along in predicting his own gruesome murder. Andrea Canning reports on the case that had this small town in fear. Originally aired on NBC on November 15, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
